author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ITG Releases February 2018 U.S. Trading Volumes And Provides International Trading Commission Update
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Investment Technology Group Inc:
* ITG RELEASES FEBRUARY 2018 U.S. TRADING VOLUMES AND PROVIDES INTERNATIONAL TRADING COMMISSION UPDATE
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - ‍FEBRUARY 2018 U.S. TRADING VOLUME WAS 2.7 BILLION SHARES COMPARED TO 2.8 BILLION SHARES IN JANUARY 2018​
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - ‍FEB 2018 U.S. AVERAGE DAILY VOLUME WAS 144 MILLION SHARES COMPARED TO 132 MILLION SHARES IN JAN 2018​
* INVESTMENT TECHNOLOGY GROUP INC - ‍AVERAGE REVENUE CAPTURE PER SHARE IN FEBRUARY 2018 WAS SLIGHTLY BELOW AVERAGE IN Q4 OF 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
